text: The Arab Socialist Action Party – Lebanon ( Hizb al-'Amal al-Ishtiraki al-'Arabi - Lubnan), was the member of the Arab Socialist Action movement in Lebanon. The party was founded by George Habash in 1969 and was closely linked to the PFLP, which Habash also led.Lebanon: The Fragmented Nation p.171The Republic of Lebanon: Nation in Jeopardy p.89 The party was a member of the Lebanese National Resistance Front during the Lebanese Civil War.The Communist Movement in Syria and Lebanon, p.115 ==References== Category:1969 establishments in Lebanon Category:Arab nationalism in Lebanon Category:Arab nationalist militant groups Category:Arab Nationalist Movement breakaway groups Category:Arab socialist political parties Category:Factions in the Lebanese Civil War Category:Lebanese National Resistance Front Category:Marxist parties Category:Nationalist parties in Lebanon Category:Pan- Arabist political parties Category:Political parties established in 1969 Category:Political parties with year of disestablishment missing Category:Secularism in Lebanon Category:Socialist parties in Lebanon
title: Arab Socialist Action Party – Lebanon
